constituent: rule, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight, sword, sabre, saber
heisigStory: The character depicts a clam alongside a great and flashing saber. Think of digging for clams in an area where there are gaming rules governing how large a find has to be before you can keep it. So you take your trusty saber, which you have carefully notched like a yardstick, crack open a clam and then measure the poor little beastie to see if it is as long as the rules say it has to be.
koohiiStory1: When you have both money and the power of the sword, you can make the rules.
koohiiStory2: If you´ve got CRABs on your SABER, then you didn´t follow the rules of safe sex!
words:
原則(げんそく): principle, general rule
不規則(ふきそく): irregularity, unsteadiness, disorderly
法則(ほうそく): law, rule
規則(きそく): regulations
